section.title: purchase orders printing of Print Purchase Order
section.para: To print a purchase order, go to Accounting > Accounts Payable > Forms > Print Purchase Order. The following screen will appear:
When printing a purchase order, you are presented with the following options:

note.para: If the vendor specified on the purchase order has an EDI profile attached, you may encounter an EDI processing interface when printing the purchase order.

listitem.para: Enter the purchase order number of the purchase order you want to print.
Specify the number of copies you want to print. To add a watermark or show/hide prices on the printed form, double-click on a copy line.
